title: Advice for a top main?
body:
Recently I've been struggling to find relevancy. Top lane is just the lane that's so far from everybody else and I play Darius so I either take Ghost or ignite. I cannot influence the map apart from walking there myself.

I'm averaging 6 CS per game which is pretty abysmal because when it comes to the laning phase is over I can't find it in myself to dedicate myself to a lane because I want to protect my team mates which ends up leaving me on the weakend.

Where can I find the balance between roaming and farming?
I shove the wave undertower then roam but by the time I walk back my tower goes from 100% to 50%.

Currently P3 promos to give you some perspective of what I'm against
